channel.title: SMF 113 Subtype 1 on IBM SMF Explorer
channel.description: Recent content in SMF 113 Subtype 1 on IBM SMF Explorer

item.title: Field - cdln
item.description: Length of counter data section Map: SMF113_1_CSS Based on: SMF113_1_CDLN Description Length of counter data section

item.title: Field - cdof
item.description: Offset to counter data section for this counter set, from the beginning of record. This can be to a SMF113_1_SCDS section or a SMF113_1_LCDS section, depending SMF113_1_CSUseLCDS Map: SMF113_1_CSS Based on: SMF113_1_CDOF Description Offset to counter data section for this counter set, from the beginning of record. This can be to a SMF113_1_SCDS section or a SMF113_1_LCDS section, depending SMF113_1_CSUseLCDS

item.title: Field - cdon
item.description: Number of counter data sections Map: SMF113_1_CSS Based on: SMF113_1_CDON Description Number of counter data sections

item.title: Field - coreid
item.description: Core ID for which the hardware event counters are recorded. Note that zero is a valid core ID number. Map: SMF113_1_CTR Based on: SMF113_1_COREID Description Core ID for which the hardware event counters are recorded. Note that zero is a valid core ID number.

item.title: Field - cpuid
item.description: Processor ID for which the hardware event counters are recorded. Note that zero is a valid processor number. Map: SMF113_1_CTR Based on: SMF113_1_CPUID Description Processor ID for which the hardware event counters are recorded. Note that zero is a valid processor number.

item.title: Field - cpuprocclass
item.description: The processor type for which the hardware event counters are recorded. Will be one of the following: 0 = Standard CP 2 = zCBP or zAAP see SMF113_1_zCBP 4 = zIIP Map: SMF113_1_CTR Based on: SMF113_1_CPUPROCCLASS Description The processor type for which the hardware event counters are recorded. Will be one of the following: 0 = Standard CP 2 = zCBP or zAAP see SMF113_1_zCBP 4 = zIIP

item.title: Field - cpuspeed
item.description: Processor speed for which the event counters are recorded. Speed is in cycles/microsecond. Map: SMF113_1_CTR Based on: SMF113_1_CPUSPEED Description Processor speed for which the event counters are recorded. Speed is in cycles/microsecond.

item.title: Field - csflags
item.description: Not available Map: SMF113_1_CSS Based on: SMF113_1_CSFLAGS Description Not available Flag fields This is a flag field with the following bit fields: Field Bit-Position Description csuselcds 0 When on the counter set’s counter data section described by fields SMF113_1_CDOF, SMF113_1_CDLN, and SMF113_1_CDON is mapped by SMF113_1_LCDS, otherwise it is mapped by SMF113_1_SCDS.

item.title: Field - csln
item.description: Length of counter set section Map: SMF113_1_CTR Based on: SMF113_1_CSLN Description Length of counter set section

item.title: Field - csof
item.description: Offset to counter set section from beginning of record Map: SMF113_1_CTR Based on: SMF113_1_CSOF Description Offset to counter set section from beginning of record

item.title: Field - cson
item.description: Number of counter set sections Map: SMF113_1_CTR Based on: SMF113_1_CSON Description Number of counter set sections

item.title: Field - cstype
item.description: Counter set type for counters recorded: 1 = Basic, 2 = Problem state, 3 = Crypto-activity, 4 = Extended 5 = z/OS 6 = MT-diagnostic Map: SMF113_1_CSS Based on: SMF113_1_CSTYPE Description Counter set type for counters recorded: 1 = Basic, 2 = Problem state, 3 = Crypto-activity, 4 = Extended 5 = z/OS 6 = MT-diagnostic

item.title: Field - csuselcds
item.description: When on the counter set’s counter data section described by fields SMF113_1_CDOF, SMF113_1_CDLN, and SMF113_1_CDON is mapped by SMF113_1_LCDS, otherwise it is mapped by SMF113_1_SCDS. Map: SMF113_1_CSS Based on: csflags Description When on the counter set’s counter data section described by fields SMF113_1_CDOF, SMF113_1_CDLN, and SMF113_1_CDON is mapped by SMF113_1_LCDS, otherwise it is mapped by SMF113_1_SCDS. Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 0 of field csflags.

item.title: Field - ctm
item.description: Time when this SMF record is written Map: SMF113_1_CTR Based on: SMF113_1_CTM Description Time when this SMF record is written

item.title: Field - ctrversion0
item.description: Zero counter version number. This number is incremented when there is a change to the meaning of a counter in the z/OS counter set Map: SMF113_1_CTR Based on: SMF113_1_CTRVERSION0 Description Zero counter version number. This number is incremented when there is a change to the meaning of a counter in the z/OS counter set

item.title: Field - ctrversion1
item.description: First counter version number. This number is incremented when there is a change to the meaning of a counter or the number of installed counters in the Basic or Problem-state counter sets Map: SMF113_1_CTR Based on: SMF113_1_CTRVERSION1 Description First counter version number. This number is incremented when there is a change to the meaning of a counter or the number of installed counters in the Basic or Problem-state counter sets

item.title: Field - ctrversion2
item.description: Second counter version number. This number is incremented when there is a change to the meaning of a counter or the number of installed counters in the Crypto-activity, Extended or MT-diagnostic counters Map: SMF113_1_CTR Based on: SMF113_1_CTRVERSION2 Description Second counter version number. This number is incremented when there is a change to the meaning of a counter or the number of installed counters in the Crypto-activity, Extended or MT-diagnostic counters

item.title: Field - cts
item.description: Time when HIS Data collection started Map: SMF113_1_CTR Based on: SMF113_1_CTS Description Time when HIS Data collection started

item.title: Field - date
item.description: Date of Record Record: SMF113S1 Based on: SMF113DTE

item.title: Field - dln
item.description: Length of data section Map: SMF113SDS Based on: SMF113DLN Description Length of data section

item.title: Field - dof
item.description: Offset of data section from beginning of record Map: SMF113SDS Based on: SMF113DOF Description Offset of data section from beginning of record

item.title: Field - don
item.description: Number of data sections Map: SMF113SDS Based on: SMF113DON Description Number of data sections

item.title: Field - dte
item.description: Record written date Record: SMF113S1 Based on: SMF113DTE Description Record written date

item.title: Field - flags
item.description: Not available Map: SMF113_1_CTR Based on: SMF113_1_FLAGS Description Not available Flag fields This is a flag field with the following bit fields: Field Bit-Position Description lostctrdata 0 When ON, the hardware indicated the hardware has lost counter data during the current interval lostdata 1 Not available lostmtdata 2 When ON, the hardware indicated the hardware has lost MT counter data during the current interval zcbp 3 When ON, a value of 2 for SMF113_1_CpuProcClass refers to a zCBP processor type, when off a zAAP processor type.

item.title: Field - flg
item.description: Header flag byte Record: SMF113S1 Based on: SMF113FLG Description Header flag byte Flag fields This is a flag field with the following bit fields: Field Bit-Position Description ssf 0 Bit 0 - Subsys ID after Sys ID sbt 1 Bit 1 - Subtypes utilized

item.title: Field - iln
item.description: Length of identification section Map: SMF113SDS Based on: SMF113ILN Description Length of identification section

item.title: Field - interval
item.description: The interval time delta Map: SMF113ID Based on: intervalstart, intervalend Post-Processed The field is created using the following pseudocode: return intervalend - intervalstart

item.title: Field - intervalend
item.description: The interval end time Map: SMF113ID Based on: SMF113INTERVALEND Description The interval end time

item.title: Field - intervalstart
item.description: The interval start time Map: SMF113ID Based on: SMF113INTERVALSTART Description The interval start time

item.title: Field - iof
item.description: Offset of identification section from beginning of record Map: SMF113SDS Based on: SMF113IOF Description Offset of identification section from beginning of record

item.title: Field - ion
item.description: Number of identification section Map: SMF113SDS Based on: SMF113ION Description Number of identification section

item.title: Field - jbn
item.description: JobName Map: SMF113ID Based on: SMF113JBN Description JobName

item.title: Field - lcr
item.description: Event counter value delta. Contains the number of times a particular counter event has occurred since either the start of the HIS collection run, or the previous SMF 113 Type 1 record. Map: SMF113_1_LCDS Based on: SMF113_1_LCR Description Event counter value delta. Contains the number of times a particular counter event has occurred since either the start of the HIS collection run, or the previous SMF 113 Type 1 record.

item.title: Field - len
item.description: Record length Record: SMF113S1 Based on: SMF113LEN Description Record length

item.title: Field - lostctrdata
item.description: When ON, the hardware indicated the hardware has lost counter data during the current interval Map: SMF113_1_CTR Based on: flags Description When ON, the hardware indicated the hardware has lost counter data during the current interval Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 0 of field flags.

item.title: Field - lostdata
item.description: Not available Map: SMF113_1_CTR Based on: flags Description Not available Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 1 of field flags.

item.title: Field - lostmtdata
item.description: When ON, the hardware indicated the hardware has lost MT counter data during the current interval Map: SMF113_1_CTR Based on: flags Description When ON, the hardware indicated the hardware has lost MT counter data during the current interval Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 2 of field flags.

item.title: Field - machmodel
item.description: The machine model Map: SMF113_1_CTR Based on: SMF113_1_MACHMODEL Description The machine model

item.title: Field - machseqcode
item.description: The machine sequence code Map: SMF113_1_CTR Based on: SMF113_1_MACHSEQCODE Description The machine sequence code

item.title: Field - machtype
item.description: The machine type Map: SMF113_1_CTR Based on: SMF113_1_MACHTYPE Description The machine type

item.title: Field - osl
item.description: MVS product level Map: SMF113SSS Based on: SMF113OSL Description MVS product level

item.title: Field - pnm
item.description: Product name - HIS Map: SMF113SSS Based on: SMF113PNM Description Product name - HIS

item.title: Field - rsd
item.description: Reader start date Map: SMF113ID Based on: SMF113RSD Description Reader start date

item.title: Field - rst
item.description: Reader start time Map: SMF113ID Based on: SMF113RST Description Reader start time

item.title: Field - rty
item.description: Record type - 113 (‘71’x) Record: SMF113S1 Based on: SMF113RTY Description Record type - 113 (‘71’x)

item.title: Field - rvn
item.description: Record version number Map: SMF113SSS Based on: SMF113RVN Description Record version number

item.title: Field - sbt
item.description: Bit 1 - Subtypes utilized Record: SMF113S1 Based on: flg Description Bit 1 - Subtypes utilized Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 1 of field flg.

item.title: Field - scr
item.description: Event counter value delta. Contains the number of times a particular counter event has occurred since either the start of the HIS collection run, or the previous SMF 113 Type 1 record. Map: SMF113_1_SCDS Based on: SMF113_1_SCR Description Event counter value delta. Contains the number of times a particular counter event has occurred since either the start of the HIS collection run, or the previous SMF 113 Type 1 record.

item.title: Field - sdl
item.description: Length of self-defining section Record: SMF113S1 Based on: SMF113SDL Description Length of self-defining section

item.title: Field - seg
item.description: Segment descriptor Record: SMF113S1 Based on: SMF113SEG Description Segment descriptor

item.title: Field - sid
item.description: System identifier Record: SMF113S1 Based on: SMF113SID Description System identifier

item.title: Field - sln
item.description: Length of subsystem section Map: SMF113SDS Based on: SMF113SLN Description Length of subsystem section

item.title: Field - sof
item.description: Offset to subsystem section from beginning of record Map: SMF113SDS Based on: SMF113SOF Description Offset to subsystem section from beginning of record

item.title: Field - son
item.description: Number of subsystem sections Map: SMF113SDS Based on: SMF113SON Description Number of subsystem sections

item.title: Field - ssf
item.description: Bit 0 - Subsys ID after Sys ID Record: SMF113S1 Based on: flg Description Bit 0 - Subsys ID after Sys ID Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 0 of field flg.

item.title: Field - stp
item.description: Step name Map: SMF113ID Based on: SMF113STP Description Step name

item.title: Field - sty
item.description: Record subtype: 1 = Delta event counters 2 = Hardware event counters Record: SMF113S1 Based on: SMF113STY Description Record subtype: 1 = Delta event counters 2 = Hardware event counters

item.title: Field - time
item.description: Time of Record Record: SMF113S1 Based on: SMF113TME

item.title: Field - timestamp
item.description: Record Timestamp Record: SMF113S1 Based on: date, time Description Timestamp from SMF data Post-Processed This field is combined from a date and a time field to form a timestamp.

item.title: Field - tme
item.description: Record written time Record: SMF113S1 Based on: SMF113TME Description Record written time

item.title: Field - wid
item.description: Subsystem identifier Record: SMF113S1 Based on: SMF113WID Description Subsystem identifier

item.title: Field - zcbp
item.description: When ON, a value of 2 for SMF113_1_CpuProcClass refers to a zCBP processor type, when off a zAAP processor type. Map: SMF113_1_CTR Based on: flags Description When ON, a value of 2 for SMF113_1_CpuProcClass refers to a zCBP processor type, when off a zAAP processor type. Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 3 of field flags.
